title: Ka Pa van in ata hlaan
lyrics:
Ka Pa, van in ata hlaan,
Lei kawng chhuk chhova ka vah hian,
Min pui la, hei hi hrilh theih nan,
'I thu ni se'.

Ka duh tak awm ta lo ngaiin,
Khawhar takin tap mah ila,
Hei hian min hnem, ka thinlungah,
'I thu ni se'.

Ka thinlung ngui malsawm langin,
I thla duhawm rawn chentirin,
Thil dang zawng i kutah awm se,
'I thu ni se.'

Ni tin tiharh rawh ka rilru,
I ta angin siam la, he thu
Kalhtu tur hi lo awm phal suh,
'I thu ni se.'

He tawngtai thu ka dam laia,
Mittui nena kalo hman kha;
Lawmin ka zaipui ang vanan,
'I thu ni se.'
